alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Highlands; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 10 at 5:43PM MST until January 11 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 6 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, South Central Highlands, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass, Union County, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 6 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Estancia Valley; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Highlands; Union County
